# Installations
## Windows

- Go to https://www.anaconda.com/products/individual/get-started and dowload a windows installer. Or use the link below (Python 3.8)  
64-bit : https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2020.07-Windows-x86_64.exe  
32-bit : https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2020.07-Windows-x86.exe
